original_text: Then he sent a command to everyone in Jerusalem and in the rest of Judah. He told them to bring the money to pay their tax to the Lord. That was the tax that God's servant Moses had told the Israelites that they should pay when they were in the wilderness.
korean_text: 유다와 예루살렘에 공포하여 하나님의 종 모세가 광야에서 이스라엘에게 정한 세를 여호와께 드리라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Then he sent a command to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 모든 사람에게 명령을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: in Jerusalem and in the rest of Judah
He told them to bring the money
to pay their tax to the Lord
that God's servant Moses had told
the Israelites that they should pay
when they were in the wilderness
